meanings.definition: Not conforming to the dietary laws of Judaism.
meanings.sent1: The unkosher meat was not allowed to be eaten during the holiday.
meanings.sent2: The family made sure to only buy kosher food, never unkosher.
meanings.sent3: The unkosher pickle tried to sneak into the kosher jar at the store.
meanings.sent4: Her unkosher behavior at the synagogue raised eyebrows among the community.
meanings.sent5: The unkosher smell coming from the kitchen made everyone suspicious.

meanings.sent1: It was unkosher for him to take credit for someone else's work.
meanings.sent2: The unkosher business deal raised red flags among the investors.
meanings.sent3: The unkosher excuse he gave for being late was easily debunked.
meanings.sent4: Her unkosher actions in the competition led to her disqualification.
meanings.sent5: The unkosher decision to cut corners resulted in a failed project.
